author: mondflug2

text: @DivineBanana That's what I meant by Ristar concept came first. During the creation of Sonic, they went through multiple gameplay designs one of which was Ristar's. Meaning, if they dropped Ristar's play style before going with the Sonic we know, that would mean Ristar came first. Technically no one had done it before since this means it was from the exact same people.
author: Arc13

text: @DivineBanana Sonic was made based upon the idea of Mario but faster as confirmed in an interview with the creator. Or if you're saying Ristar came from Sonic, the idea happened before Sonic was made. Comparing the two games' gameplay they really can't be compared, far too different.
